queries.query: SELECT sum("fs_available_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Available" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null); SELECT sum("fs_used_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Used" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT sum("fs_available_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Available" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null); SELECT sum("fs_used_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Used" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT sum("memory_usage_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Memory Used" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null); SELECT mean("memory_available_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Memory Free" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT sum("memory_usage_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Memory Used" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null); SELECT mean("memory_available_bytes")/1000000000 AS "Memory Free" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT sum("cpu_usage_nanocores")/1000000000 AS "cpu_usage" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null);select sum(*) as total from (SELECT mean("gauge") as cores FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY "node") GROUP BY time(10s)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT sum("cpu_usage_nanocores")/1000000000 AS "cpu_usage" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null);select sum(*) as total from (SELECT mean("gauge") as cores FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY "node") GROUP BY time(10s)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("network_rx_bytes"))/1000000 AS "Recieved", non_negative_derivative(sum("network_tx_bytes"))/1000000 AS "sent" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null)
